data.title: Future Cut - Horns (NC - 17 Remix) by Renegade Hardware
data.meta_description: Stream Future Cut - Horns (NC - 17 Remix) by Renegade Hardware on desktop and mobile. Play over 320 million tracks for free on SoundCloud.
data.text:
published on 2023-09-11T09:42:45Z

Cat No: RHFTV01 Artist: Konflict / Future Cut Title: âMessiah (Magnetude Remix) / Horns (NC-17 Remix)â Release Date: 22nd September 2023 Record Label: Renegade Hardware Founded in 1995 Renegade Hardware has been at the forefront of pioneering the techstep and neurofunk sound and is regarded as one of the most influential labels in Drum & Bass. With a history expanding almost 30 years, the label was the gateway to some of the scenes leading artists of today, such as Loxy & Ink, Chase & Status, Friction, Noisia, Spor, Audio, Phace, Calyx & Teebee, Konflict, Prolix, to name a few, gracing its historic back catalogue. In 2016, after more than two decades at the forefront of the scene, Renegade Hardware announced its closure. The label's final chapter was marked by a series of releases and farewell events that brought together fans, artists, and industry insiders to pay tribute to its legacy. Fast forward to the present, and with a complete reshape, Renegade Hardware returns with the highly anticipated remix album âFrom The Vaultsâ, which features an eclectic mix of future artists who have reimagined some of the most iconic tracks from Renegade Hardware's historic back catalogue. Entering the flip side of this double A side release is Future Cutâs classic âHornsâ - A staple track in the Renegade Hardware Discography. Much like 'Messiah,' 'Horns' has seen previous remixes from notable artists like Dylan and Gremilnz & Overlook. Now, the exceptionally skilled and consistently impressive NC-17 steps in to bring 'Horns' up to contemporary standards. NC-17âs rendition transports listeners into a captivating, rolling universe that seamlessly melds with the core essence of Future Cut's original masterpiece and the Canadians distinguishable sound. With these first two exceptional remixes setting a high standard, Renegade Hardware takes you on a journey - âFrom The Vaultsâ.

Genre

Drum & Bass
